options.name: Beginner Priest
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Divine Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Action : Bless
options.description: You touch a Weapon, causing it to glow with radiant energy. The next time this weapon hits a creature, the primary damage is converted to Divine damage. If you elect to Focus on this Action, you can recharge the weapon with a Reaction.

options.name: Novice Priest
options.description: You can research Novice Level Divine Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Lay Hands
options.description: You touch a target, restoring them to half of their Maximum Health.

options.name: Reaction [Daily] : Faith in Allies
options.description: If you are at 0 Health, you can use your Reaction, regardless of limitations, to immediately grant up to 3 Allies within 10 Units a Heroic Action.

options.name: Journeyman Priest
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Divine Spells, gain +5 Power and +2 Divine Mitigation

options.name: Mass Bless
options.description: Your Bless Action can be used on Weapons within 10 Units and affects 3 Weapons instead of 1.

options.name: Expert Priest
options.description: You can research Expert Level Divine Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Action : Celestial Wings
options.description: You sprout Celestial Wings, granting you a Fly Speed of 6 for the next Hour. While you fly in this way, you must spend at least 1 Move Action per Round or you will begin falling.

options.name: Divine Wrath
options.description: Your Divine Spells become Brutal Criticals on a True Hit against Dark and Undead Creatures.

options.name: Master Priest
options.description: You can research Master Level Divine Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Divine Spells at level 13.
